00020 #if !defined(APOXI_MAX_NET_FILENAME_LENGTH)
00021     #define APOXI_MAX_NET_FILENAME_LENGTH 255
00022 #endif
00023 
00028 #if !defined(APOXI_MAX_NET_STORAGE_DEVICE_ID_LENGTH)
00029     #define APOXI_MAX_NET_STORAGE_DEVICE_ID_LENGTH 3
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 /* The pathname must be big enough to hold the longest filename. If the virtual
00033    root storage device is part of the system then the pathname must be big
00034    enough to also hold the starting storage device Id string with its
00035    surrounding separators, otherwise it must only also hold the leading
00036    separator. */
00037 #if defined(APOXI_LIB_ADDON_AFSRFS)
00038 
00040     #define APOXI_MAX_PATHNAME_LENGTH (                                       \
00041         1 /* The starting separator. */ +                                     \
00042         APOXI_MAX_NET_STORAGE_DEVICE_ID_LENGTH /* The storage device Id. */ + \
00043         1 /* The following separator. */ +                                    \
00044         APOXI_MAX_NET_FILENAME_LENGTH + /* The filename itself. */            \
00045         1 /* The terminating \c 0 character. */                               \
00046         )
00047 #else
00048 
00050     #define APOXI_MAX_PATHNAME_LENGTH (                             \
00051         1 /* The starting separator. */ +                           \
00052         APOXI_MAX_NET_FILENAME_LENGTH + /* The filename itself. */  \
00053         1 /* The terminating \c 0 character. */                     \
00054         )
00055 #endif  // APOXI_LIB_ADDON_AFSRFS
00056 
00058 #endif  // Apoxi_RfsConfig_hpp
